channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk says the major work of establishing DOGE is done and calls it a ‘way of life, like Buddhism’
item.description: Amid protests and Tesla stock market drops, Musk is pivoting away from Washington.

item.title: Trump ending the tariff loophole that allowed companies to cheaply ship 4 million packages per day from China to the U.S. could raise prices even further
item.description: Consumers can expect higher prices and delivery delays when the Trump administration ends a duty-free exemption on low-value imports from China.

item.title: Tony Nominations Snubs and Surprises: Denzel Washington Misses for ‘Othello’ and More
item.description: Ensemble-driven plays like “Purpose” and “English” received a slew of nominations, while Denzel Washington, Jake Gyllenhaal and Idina Menzel were over...

item.title: Who Decides How Much You Pay for College? Here’s How Tuition Costs Are Set.
item.description: Schools turn to little-known consultants, owned by private equity firms, to find applicants and calculate scholarships. Here’s how that affects the pr...

item.title: Robinhood says customers deposited a record $6.5 billion in April as active traders try to profit off market chaos
item.description: CEO Vlad Tenev said the company has become “more resilient” by targeting sophisticated retail investors.

item.title: U.S. and U.N. Urge De-escalation Between India and Pakistan
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio spoke with top officials from both countries in an effort to avoid another conflict over the disputed region of Kashmir...

item.title: Kennedy Issues Demands for Vaccine Approvals That Could Affect Fall Covid Boosters
item.description: The agency suggested that clinical trials in humans may be required for updated Covid shots, raising questions about whether they will be available in...

item.title: The mystery of Elon Musk’s future deepens as Tesla CEO speaks out about DOGE multitasking
item.description: “Being attacked relentlessly is not super fun," Elon Musk said.

item.title: This is the best nut to eat if you want to lower your colorectal cancer risk, study finds
item.description: It may be time to add a handful of this nut to your daily snack rotation.

item.title: Odile de Vasselot, Teenage Aristocrat in the French Resistance, Dies at 103
item.description: During World War II, she deceived her watchful mother so she could take part in dangerous missions. Later, she founded a girls’ school in Ivory Coast.

item.title: Israel Scrambles to Extinguish Wildfires on Outskirts of Jerusalem
item.description: Authorities reopened the main highway between Tel Aviv and Jerusalem and allowed evacuees to return to their homes in Israel and the Israeli-occupied ...

item.title: Tesla Chair Denies That Board Sought to Replace Elon Musk
item.description: Robyn Denholm, who leads Tesla’s board, said on social media that board members were “highly confident” in Mr. Musk, the company’s chief executive.

item.title: U.S. and U.N. Urge De-Escalation Between India and Pakistan
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio spoke with top officials from both countries in an effort to avoid another conflict over the disputed region of Kashmir...

item.title: Trans Women Banned From Competing in Women’s Soccer in England

item.title: Julia Parsons, U.S. Navy Code Breaker During World War II, Dies at 104
